title: All-in-one wallet card to spell end of individual credit card?
text:
All-in-one wallet card to spell end of individual credit card? 12:36pm GMT - 01:36 
A single card that allows shoppers to access various payment options from multiple accounts is being displayed at the Mobile World Congress (MWC) in Barcelona. Jim Drury reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A single card that allows shoppers to access various payment options from multiple accounts is being displayed at the Mobile World Congress (MWC) in Barcelona. Jim Drury reports.
